'''Spirits of Omen''' are an enemy group. They are summoned by high-tier [[The Eremites/Enemies|Eremite]] enemies.

==Types==
*{{Enemy|Spirit of Omen: Stone Drake}} &mdash; Summoned by [[Eremite Stone Enchanter]]s.
*{{Enemy|Spirit of Omen: Wind Glede}} &mdash; Summoned by [[Eremite Galehunter]]s.
*{{Enemy|Spirit of Omen: Dendro Spirit-Serpent}} &mdash; Summoned by [[Eremite Floral Ring-Dancer]]s.
*{{Enemy|Spirit of Omen: Pyro Scorpion}} &mdash; Summoned by [[Eremite Scorching Loremaster]]s.
